SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC WML.COMMON.EMAIL !Get Operator :SET &userid# = &EMAIL# :ADD_ATT RECIPIENT, &userid# :IF &SECOND# = '' : ELSE :SET &secemail# = &SECOND# :ADD_ATT RECIPIENT, &secemail# :ENDIF
:SET &USER# = SYS_USER_NAME :read &UC_CAUSE_NAME,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_NR,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_STATE,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE,,, ! :SET &lang# = SYS_USER_LANGUAGE :if &lang# = 'E' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' from user ID '&USER#' Client:'&$client#'" : SET &ht = "Your job &UC_CAUSE_NAME in &$SYSTEM# has failed!" : SET &c1#="System name" : SET &c2#="Client" : SET &c3#="Object" : SET &c4#="Run Id" : SET &c5#="User Id" : SET &c6#="State (Text)" : SET &c7#="Return code" : SET &c8#="Time" : SET &c9#="Parent object" : SET &ca#="Parent type" : SET &cb#="Parent run Id" :endif ! :SET &parentname# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME('ACT') :SET &parentnr# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR('ACT') :SET &parenttyp# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYP('ACT') :SET &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL('YYYY-MM-DD') :SET &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") :SET &statustext# = get_msg_txt(&UC_CAUSE_STATE,'') :INC WML.COMMON.EMAIL.CANCEL :INC WML.COMMON.JIRA.CALL

:set &parentname# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME('ACT') :DEFINE &STRING#, string, 100
:FILL &STRING#[] = STR_SPLIT(&parentname#,".")
:SET &EMAIL# = GET_VAR(VARA.EMAIL.DISTRIBUTION,&STRING#[2]) :print The Email is &EMAIL# :IF &EMAIL# = '' : SET &EMAIL# = GET_VAR(VARA.EMAIL.DISTRIBUTION,'GLOBAL') :ENDIF :print The Email is &EMAIL#
!Get Operator :set &userid# = &EMAIL#
:ADD_ATT OPERATOR, '&userid#' ! !Get Script :read &UC_CAUSE_NAME,, :read &UC_CAUSE_NR,, :read &UC_CAUSE_STATE,, :read &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE,, ! :set &nl# = UC_CRLF !
:set &parentnr# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR('ACT') :set &parenttyp# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYP('ACT') :set &system# = GET_UC_SYSTEM_NAME :set &client# = SYS_ACT_CLIENT :set &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL() :set &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") :set &lang# = SYS_USER_LANGUAGE :set &statustext# = get_msg_txt(&UC_CAUSE_STATE,'') ! :if &lang# = 'E' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&parentname#' Job:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' Client:'&client#'" ! : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' Client:'&client#'" : set &date# = conv_date(&date#,"MM/DD/YYYY") : PUT_ATT CALL_TEXT = "An error occurred! &nl# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "UC4 System: &system# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Client: &client# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Object: &UC_CAUSE_NAME &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Run#: &UC_CAUSE_NR &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "State Text: &statustext# (&UC_CAUSE_STATE) &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Retcode: &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Date/Time: &date# &time# &nl# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Parent of this object (if available): &nl# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Parent: &parentname# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Type: &parenttyp# &nl#" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "Run#: &parentnr# &nl#" :endif

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC WML.COMMON.EMAIL !Get Operator :SET &userid# = &EMAIL# :ADD_ATT RECIPIENT, &userid# :IF &SECOND# = '' : ELSE :SET &secemail# = &SECOND# :ADD_ATT RECIPIENT, &secemail# :ENDIF
:SET &USER# = SYS_USER_NAME :read &UC_CAUSE_NAME,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_NR,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_STATE,,, :read &UC_CAUSE_RETCODE,,, ! :SET &lang# = SYS_USER_LANGUAGE :if &lang# = 'E' : put_att SUBJECT = "Alarm:'&UC_CAUSE_NAME' RunID:'&UC_CAUSE_NR' from user ID '&USER#' Client:'&$client#'" : SET &ht = "Your job &UC_CAUSE_NAME in &$SYSTEM# has failed!" : SET &c1#="System name" : SET &c2#="Client" : SET &c3#="Object" : SET &c4#="Run Id" : SET &c5#="User Id" : SET &c6#="State (Text)" : SET &c7#="Return code" : SET &c8#="Time" : SET &c9#="Parent object" : SET &ca#="Parent type" : SET &cb#="Parent run Id" :endif
! :SET &parentname# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NAME('ACT') :SET &parentnr# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_NR('ACT') :SET &parenttyp# = SYS_ACT_PARENT_TYP('ACT') :SET &date# = SYS_DATE_PHYSICAL('YYYY-MM-DD') :SET &time# = SYS_TIME_PHYSICAL("HH:MM:SS") :SET &statustext# = get_msg_txt(&UC_CAUSE_STATE,'') :INC WML.COMMON.EMAIL.CANCEL !:INC WML.COMMON.JIRA.CALL

!Get the user to the email :set &userid# = SYS_USER_NAME :set &dep# = SYS_USER_DEP :ADD_ATT OPERATOR, '&userid#/&dep#'
:set &nl# = UC_CRLF : put_att SUBJECT = "Duplicate Jobs List" :PUT_ATT CALL_TEXT = "Duplicate Jobs List &nl# &nl#"
:SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_DUPLICATE_JOBS#) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : SET &MSG# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "&VK# - ERROR:&MSG# &nl#&nl#" :ENDPROCESS
:CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &DELETE_VARA# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_SCRATCH_FILES#) :PROCESS &DELETE_VARA# : SET &VARA_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&DELETE_VARA#, 1) : INC JOBI.REMOVE_OBJECT &VARA# = &VARA_NAME# :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &DELETE_VARA#
:INC JOBI.REMOVE_OBJECT &VARA# = &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES#

!Get the user to the email :set &userid# = SYS_USER_NAME :set &dep# = SYS_USER_DEP :ADD_ATT OPERATOR, '&userid#/&dep#'
:set &nl# = UC_CRLF : put_att SUBJECT = "Processed Jobs List" :PUT_ATT CALL_TEXT = "Processed Jobs List &nl# &nl#"
:SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED#) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : SET &PROCESSED# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) : SET &RUNID# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 3) : SET &MSG# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 4) : IF &PROCESSED# = "YES" : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "&VK# - PROCESSED &nl#" : ELSE : put_att_append CALL_TEXT = "&VK# - ERROR:&MSG# &nl#&nl#" : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &DELETE_VARA# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_SCRATCH_FILES#) :PROCESS &DELETE_VARA# : SET &VARA_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&DELETE_VARA#, 1) : INC JOBI.REMOVE_OBJECT &VARA# = &VARA_NAME# :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &DELETE_VARA#
:INC JOBI.REMOVE_OBJECT &VARA# = &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES#

:ADD_ATT RECIPIENT, &EMAIL_ADDR#
:SET &RUNID# = FORMAT(&RUNID#,"0") :set &nl# = UC_CRLF :PUT_ATT CALL_TEXT = 'Jobs that have been imported. &nl#&nl#' :SET &HLD# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(SCRI,&RUNID#,ACT,'*has been imported.*') :PROCESS &HLD# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HLD#) : SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,'Obj') : SET &POS# = &POS# + 7 : SET &LINE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&POS#) ! : PRINT &LINE# : PUT_ATT_APPEND CALL_TEXT = '&LINE#&nl#' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HLD#

ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.USOFM.SYNAPSE.S2S.TRK.HOURLY,,,, &MIN48) :SET &ACT49 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.USOFM.TBLU.PO.TRANS.GIS.MONITOR.DASHBOARD,,,, &MIN49) :SET &ACT50 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.USWMT.ORDERS.HOURLY.15THMIN,,,, &MIN50) :SET &ACT51 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.USWMT.ORDERS.HOURLY.15THMIN.CNCL.DTL.HOURLY,,,, &MIN51) :SET &ACT52 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.USWMT.ORDERS.HOURLY.25THMIN,,,, &MIN52) :SET &ACT53 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.USWMT.ORDERS.HOURLY.2NDMIN,,,, &MIN53) :SET &ACT54 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.WF.CSD.CSD.HIVE.OMNI.LOADS.ALARM,,,, &MIN54) :SET &ACT8 = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(EVNT.FINANCE.SOA.HOURLY.25TH.MIN,,,, &MIN08)

!Write XML to disk :SET &EXPORT_FILE# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, EXPORT_FILE) :SET &EXPORT_FILE# = RESOLVE_VAR(&EXPORT_FILE#) : P XML file &EXPORT_FILE# :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&XML#, &EXPORT_FILE#, &AGENT#, &LOGIN#, OVERWRITE) !Import the XML file :SET &RET# = IMPORT(&EXPORT_FILE#, &IMPORT_DIR#, 1, 1)

:SET &DIR# = '&TEMP_DIR#&SLASH#&JOB_INC#.xml' :set &ret# = export(&JOB_INC#,&DIR#) :SET &HND_INC# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#,&DIR#,"*&*") :PROCESS &HND_INC# : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND_INC#,1) : p The line &vk# : SET &POS_AMP# = STR_FIND(&VK#,"&") : SET &POS_AMP# = &POS_AMP# + 1 : SET &POS_LBS# = STR_FIND(&VK#,"#") : SET &POS_DIFF# = &POS_LBS# - &POS_AMP# + 1 : SET &PARAM_KEY# = SUBSTR(&VK#,&POS_AMP#,&POS_DIFF#) : SET &PARAM_KEY# = STR_CAT('&&',&PARAM_KEY#) : SET &KEY# = SUBSTR(&VK#,2,2) : SET &KEY# = STR_CAT('&"&<',&KEY#) : SET &PARAM_VALUE# = STR_CAT(&KEY#,'&>&"') : P The key is &VK# : IF GET_VAR(&CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#,1) = '' : PUT_VAR &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#, &PARAM_VALUE# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND_INC#
:SET &PARAM# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#) :SET &ROWS1# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&PARAM#, ROWS) :IF &ROWS1# > 0 : SET &PARAM_KEY# = STR_CAT('&&','PROCESS_HOST#') : PUT_VAR &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#, "" :ENDIF :CLOSE_PROCESS &PARAM#

:SET &JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_HOLDING_JOB#) :PROCESS &JOBS# : SET &FILE_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#, 2) : SET &FILE_TO_READ# = STR_LC('&FILE_PATH#&FILE_NAME#.item') ! Creates a handle to the XML file. : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#, &FILE_TO_READ#)
! Get a connection to the XML that will be written to disk used later to import : SET &XML# = XML_PROCESS_TO_DOM(&HND#)
! Set the pointer to the file of the first 'node' : SET &XML# = XML_SELECT_NODE(&XML#, "node") : SET &COMP_NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&XML#, "@componentName") : SET &COMP_NAME# = STR_UC(&COMP_NAME#)
! Loop until all the nodes have been read. : WHILE &COMP_NAME# <> "" : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&XML#) : SET &COMP_NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&XML#, "@componentName") : SET &COMP_NAME# = STR_UC(&COMP_NAME#) : print &COMP_NAME# ! Check to see if it one of the talend components. : IF &COMP_NAME# = "TRUNJOB" : WHILE &SUBELEMENT# <> "" ! Get the name and value of the XML component. : INC JOBI.GET_XML_ATTRIBUTE : PRINT "attribute value: &NAME# &value#" : SWITCH &NAME# ! Activate determines if the component is active. : CASE ACTIVATE : SET &isACTIVE# = &VALUE# : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = "" ! Process is the job that will execute once the job is build. : CASE PROCESS : SET &PROCESS# = STR_UC(&VALUE#) : CASE UNIQUE_NAME : SET &JOBNAME# = &VALUE# ! Label is the actual name of the job. : CASE 'LABEL' : IF &TALEND_JOBS# = 'UKASDA' : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = &FILE_NAME_KEY# : ELSE : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = &VALUE# : IF &JOB_PROCESS# = '__PROCESS__' : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = &PROCESS# : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = STR_SUB(&JOB_PROCESS#, '_', '.') : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = STR_UC(&JOB_PROCESS#) ! Process throught to get all the parameters of the job. : SET &OBJ_TYPE# = GET_OH_IDNR(&JOB_PROCESS#) : P JOB_PROCESS &JOB_PROCESS# AND OBJECT_TYPE &OBJ_TYPE# : IF &OBJ_TYPE# > 0 : PUT_VAR &VARA_DUPLICATE_JOBS#, &JOB_PROCESS#, "Job Already exist, please select another name" : SET &CANT_IMPORT# = 'TRUE' : ENDIF : ENDSWITCH : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUBELEMENT#) : ENDWHILE : ENDIF : SET &XML# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&XML#) : ENDWHILE : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &JOBS#

:SET &XML1# = &XML# ! Set the pointer to the file of the first 'node' :SET &XML1# = XML_SELECT_NODE(&XML1#, "node") :SET &COMP_NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&XML1#, "@componentName") :SET &COMP_NAME# = STR_UC(&COMP_NAME#) :PSET &CNT_NODES# = 0
:WHILE &COMP_NAME# <> "" : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&XML1#) : SET &COMP_NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&XML1#, "@componentName") : SET &COMP_NAME# = STR_UC(&COMP_NAME#) : IF &COMP_NAME# <> "" : PSET &CNT_NODES# = &CNT_NODES# + 1 : ENDIF : SET &XML1# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&XML1#) :ENDWHILE

:PSET &PID# = &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID# :PSET &CON# = 'CONVERSION.&PID#' :PSET &CON_WF# = 'CONVERSION_WF.&PID#' :PSET &CON_WF_CR# = 'CONVERSION_WF_CR.&PID#' :PSET &CON_PARAM# = 'CONVERSION_PARAM.&PID#'
:SET &VARA_LOC# = &VARA_CONV_DIR# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_WF# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_WF_CR#

:IF &VARA_NAME# <> &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES# : PUT_VAR '&VARA_SCRATCH_FILES#', &VARA_NAME#, '' :ENDIF
:SET &RUNID# = CREATE_OBJECT('VARA', &VARA_NAME#, &VARA_LOC#, , "I", "C", "FREE")
:DELETE_VAR &VARA_HOLDING#, &FILE_NAME_KEY#

HEADER.Title: You can pass the number of days to subtract from the current date.

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &DATE# = SUB(&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#,&DAYS#)

:WHILE &SUBELEMENT# <> "" : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@name") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : PRINT "attribute value: &NAME# &value#" : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUBELEMENT#)
: SWITCH &NAME# : CASE FILENAME : SET &FILENAME# = &VALUE# : CASE UNIQUE_NAME : SET &JOBNAME# = &VALUE# : ENDSWITCH :ENDWHILE
:PUT &CON#, &JOBNAME#,&FILENAME#,,,,&JOB_CNT# :INCLUDE JOBI.INCR.COUNTER :SET &JOB_CNT# = &CNT#
:P &&FILENAME# = &FILENAME# &&JOBNAME# = &JOBNAME#

:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILENAME(&AGENT#, "&FILE_TO_READ#", "Y", "N", , , , 'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) ! : SET &LINE# = STR_UC(&LINE#) : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LINE#, &SLASH#) : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRINGS#[], SIZE) : SET &POS# = STR_LENGTH(&STRINGS#[&LEN#])
! Remove the item extension from the file name : SET &POS# = &POS# - 5 : SET &FILE_NAME# = SUBSTR(&STRINGS#[&LEN#], 1, &POS#) : SET &FILE_NAME# = STR_UC(&FILE_NAME#) ! Remove the version from the file name : SET &POS# = &POS# - 4 : SET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = SUBSTR(&STRINGS#[&LEN#], 1, &POS#) : SET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = STR_SUB(&FILE_NAME_KEY#, '_', '.') : SET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = STR_UC(&FILE_NAME_KEY#) : PUT_VAR &VARA_HOLDING_JOB#, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, &FILE_NAME# : PUT_VAR '&VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED#', &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 'NO' : PUT_VAR &CLEAN_UP#, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 'NO' :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#

:SET &COL# = 1 :WHILE &SUB_SUBELEMENT# <> "" : PSET &JOB_INC# = GET_VAR(VARA.COMMON.FUNCTION,&PROCESS#) : IF &JOB_INC# = '' : SET &PARAM_DATA# = 'FALSE' : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = "" : ELSE : PSET &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME# = '&CON_PARAM#_&JOBNAME#' : INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#
: SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#, "@elementRef") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : PRINT "attribute value: &NAME# &value# &job_cnt#" : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#) : SWITCH &NAME# : CASE "PARAM_NAME_COLUMN" : PSET &PARAM_DATA# = 'TRUE' : P THE PARAM VALUE IS &VALUE# AND &PROCESS# : SET &PARAM# = STR_CAT('&&',&VALUE#) : SET &PARAM# = STR_CAT(&PARAM#,'#')
: CASE "PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN" : SET &VALUE# = STR_SUB(&VALUE#,'"','') : IF &TALEND_JOBS# = 'UKASDA' : SWITCH &VALUE# : CASE context.EndDt : SET &VALUE# = '' : CASE context.StartDt : SET &VALUE# = '' : ENDSWITCH : ENDIF ! begin:Code to prepend subject area to yaml : IF STR_FIND(&PARAM#,"YAML")>0 : SET &TRACK_LOW# = STR_LC(&TRACK#) : SET &TRACK_YAML# = STR_CAT(&SLASH#,&TRACK_LOW#) : SET &VALUE# = STR_CAT("&TRACK_YAML#&SLASH#",&VALUE#) : ENDIF ! end:Code to prepend subject area to yaml : PUT_VAR &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#, &PARAM#, &VALUE# : SET &VARA# = STR_UC(&PROCESS#) : P &VARA# AND WITH KEY &PARAM# : P &JOB_CNT#, &VALUE# : SET &COL# = &COL# + 1 : ENDSWITCH : ENDIF :ENDWHILE
:IF &PARAM_DATA# = 'TRUE' : INC JOBI.CHECK_FOR_MISSING_PARAMETERS :ELSE : INC JOBI.REMOVE_OBJECT &VARA# = &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME# :ENDIF
:SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@name") :SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@value")
:SET &CNT# = &CNT# + 1 :SET &CNT# = FORMAT(&CNT#,"00")

:IF &act_runid# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#, &ERRINS#) : DELETE_VAR &CLEAN_UP#, &FILE_NAME_KEY# : PUT_VAR_COL '&VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED#', &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 3, &MESSAGE# : SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&VARA#) :ENDIF
:PSET &PROCESS_HOST# = &$AGENT#
:INC JOBI.SET_GIS_ENVIRNOMENT_VARIABLES :SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&$NAME#,JB.STG) :p &POS# :IF &POS# <> 0 :IF &PROCESS_HOST# <> '' : PUT_ATT HOST = &PROCESS_HOST# :ENDIF :ENDIF

:SET &JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&PROCESS_JOBS#) :PROCESS &JOBS# : PSET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#, 1) : PSET &FILE_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#, 2)
: PSET &VARA# = VARA.&FILE_NAME_KEY# : IF &FILE_NAME# <> '' : SET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = STR_UC(&FILE_NAME_KEY#) : SET &OBJECT_ID# = GET_OH_IDNR(&FILE_NAME_KEY#) : IF &OBJECT_ID# > 0 : PSET &FILE_EXIST# = 'TRUE' : ELSE : SET &KEY# = SUBSTR(&FILE_NAME_KEY#, 2) : SET &KEY# = STR_CAT("WF", &KEY#) : SET &KEY# = STR_SUB(&KEY#, "_", ".") : SET &OBJECT_ID# = GET_OH_IDNR(&KEY#) : p The key is &KEY# : IF &OBJECT_ID# > 0 : PSET &FILE_EXIST# = 'TRUE' : ELSE : PSET &FILE_EXIST# = 'FALSE' : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &FILE_EXIST# = 'FALSE' : SET &PROCESSED# = GET_VAR(&VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED#, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 1) : P **** PROCESSED = &PROCESSED# : IF &PROCESSED# = 'NO' : PSET &VARA# = VARA.&FILE_NAME_KEY# : P *** PROCESS FILE &FILE_NAME_KEY# : P ** JOB TO ACTIVATE IS &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# : SET &WFLOOP_JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.CHECK_FOR_DUPLICATE_JOBS) : SET &ROWS1# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&WFLOOP_JOBS#, ROWS) : CLOSE_PROCESS &WFLOOP_JOBS# : SET &ROWS1# = FORMAT('0', &ROWS1#) : IF &ROWS1# = 0 : INC JOBI.SET_TIME_DELAY : INC JOBI.ACTIVATE_OBJECT &ALIAS# = &FILE_NAME_KEY# : INC JOBI.OUTPUT_ERROR : ENDIF ! : PSET &JOB_COUNTER# = &JOB_COUNTER# + 1 ! : PUT_VAR &VARA_RUN_ID#, &act_runid#,&act_runid# ! if an error occurs act_runid will be a 0.
: ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &JOBS#
! :SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&VARA#)

:SET &POS# = STR_FIND(&LINE#, &SEARCH#) :IF &POS# > 0 : SET &LEN# = STR_LNG(&SEARCH#) : SET &POS# = &POS# + &LEN# : SET &LINE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#, &POS#) : SET &LINE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&LINE#, '"/>', '') : SET &LINE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&LINE#, '-', '_') :ENDIF

:PSET &VARA_HOLDING# = 'VARA.HOLDING.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_HOLDING_JOB# = 'VARA.HOLDING.JOB.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED# = 'VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES# = 'VARA.SCRATCH.FILES.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &TALEND_JOBS# = &TALEND#
:IF &TRACK# <> '' : PSET &WF_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&TRACK#\&WF_LOC# : PSET &JOBS_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&TRACK#\&JOB_LOC# : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#,&SLASH#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#,&TALEND#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#,&SLASH#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#,&TRACK#) :ELSE : PSET &WF_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&WF_LOC# : PSET &JOBS_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&JOB_LOC# : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#,&SLASH#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#,&TALEND#) :ENDIF :PSET &FILE_DIR# = STR_LC(&FILE_DIR#) :PSET &QUEUE# = 'QUEUE.&TALEND#' :SET &ALIAS# = '' :INC JOBI.ACTIVATE_OBJECT &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = SCRI.CREATE.DIRECTORY
:PSET &VARA_LOC# = &VARA_CONV_DIR#
:INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_HOLDING# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_HOLDING_JOB# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED#

:PSET &MASTER_RUNID# = &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#
:PSET &WALMART_ROOT# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, WALMART_ROOT) :SET &FILE_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, FILE_DIR) :PSET &TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, TEMP_DIR) :PSET &QUEUE_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, QUEUE_DIR) :PSET &AGENT# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, AGENT) :PSET &LOGIN# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, LOGIN) :PSET &VARA_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, VARA_DIR) :PSET &VARA_CONV_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, VARA_CONV_DIR) :PSET &@OS# = GET_VAR(UC_HOST_JCL_VAR,&AGENT#) :PSET &EXPORT_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, EXPORT_DIR)
:SWITCH &@OS# : CASE UNIX : PSET &SLASH# = '/' : CASE WINDOWS : PSET &SLASH# = '\' :ENDSWITCH

:PSET &BIN# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, BIN) :PSET &CFG# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, CFG) :PSET &INBOUND# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, INBOUND) :PSET &LOG# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, LOG) :PSET &OUTBOUND# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, OUTBOUND) :PSET &PARAM# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, PARAM) :PSET &SCR# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, SCR) :PSET &TALENDJOBS# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, TALENDJOBS) :PSET &WATCH# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, WATCH) :PSET &YAML# = GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, YAML) :PSET &ORA_TALEND_ETL_DB_Server_Conn#=GET_VAR(VARA.GIS, ORA_TALEND_ETL_DB_Server_Conn)
:SET &TIME# = ADD_TIME(&$PHYS_TIME_HHMMSS#, "MM;01","HH:MM:SS") :SET &DT# = STR_CAT(&$PHYS_DATE_YYYY_MM_DD_d#," ") :SET &DT# = STR_CAT(&DT#, &TIME#)

:DEFINE &SECONDS#, unsigned :SET &SECORDS# = 10 :SET &LOOP# = 'Y' :WHILE &LOOP#= 'Y' : SET &CLEAN_UP_JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&SLEEP_VAR#) : SET &ROWS# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&CLEAN_UP_JOBS#, ROWS) : CLOSE_PROCESS &CLEAN_UP_JOBS# : IF &ROWS# = 0 : SET &LOOP# = 'N' : ELSE sleep &SECONDS# : IF &SECONDS# > 10 : SET &SECONDS# = SUB(&SECONDS#, 10) : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDWHILE
:SET &NBR# = FORMAT(&NR#,"0")

:SET &DOC# = PREP_PROCESS_DOCU("<XML_DOCU>",Docu) :PROCESS &DOC# ! Get the XML from the Document Object replacing script variables using STR_SUB_VAR : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&DOC#,,STR_SUB_VAR) : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&XML#, &LINE#) :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &DOC#

:DEFINE &SECONDS#, unsigned :SET &LOOP# = 'Y' :WHILE &LOOP#= 'Y' : SET &CLEAN_UP_JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CLEAN_UP#) : SET &ROWS# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&CLEAN_UP_JOBS#, ROWS) : CLOSE_PROCESS &CLEAN_UP_JOBS# : IF &ROWS# = 0 : SET &LOOP# = 'N' : ELSE sleep &SECONDS# : IF &SECONDS# > 10 : SET &SECONDS# = SUB(&SECONDS#, 10) : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDWHILE
:SET &ALIAS# = '' :INC JOBI.ACTIVATE_OBJECT &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = CALL.JOB_LIST_PROCESSED

:SET &CLIENT = SYS_ACT_CLIENT() !Let's determine which hosts are not supposed to be running and skip !notification if they are listed in the variable VARA.UNUSED.AGENTS.&CLIENT :SET &BADHOST# = GET_VAR("VARA.BADHOSTS.&CLIENT", BADHOST1) : IF &BADHOST# = "&HOST#" : STOP NOMSG :ENDIF :SET &BADHOST# = GET_VAR("VARA.BADHOSTS.&CLIENT", BADHOST2) : IF &BADHOST# = "&HOST#" : STOP NOMSG :ENDIF :SET &BADHOST# = GET_VAR("VARA.BADHOSTS.&CLIENT", BADHOST3) : IF &BADHOST# = "&HOST#" : STOP NOMSG :ENDIF ! Let's figure out what email address to send the notification ! to per client number. 1000 PROD will be gecsgiscpe, 2000 QA will ! be gisautomic and 3000 DEV will be gisautomic. :IF &CLIENT = 1000 : SET &MAIL = "gecsgiscpe@email.wal-mart.com" :ENDIF :IF &CLIENT = 3000 : SET &MAIL = "gisautomic@wal-mart.com" :ENDIF !Now, lets check the hosts that are supposed to be "Alive" :IF SYS_HOST_ALIVE("&HOST#") = "N" : SEND_MSG "BHUDGI1","HOMEOFFICE","Agent &HOST# is not active!" : SET &OUT# = SEND_MAIL("&MAIL",,"&HOST# is down","&HOST# is not active",) :ENDIF

:PSET &MASTER_RUNID# = &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID# :PSET &WALMART_ROOT# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, WALMART_ROOT) :SET &FILE_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, FILE_DIR) :PSET &TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, TEMP_DIR) :PSET &QUEUE_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, QUEUE_DIR) :PSET &AGENT# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, AGENT) :PSET &LOGIN# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, LOGIN) :PSET &VARA_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, VARA_DIR) :PSET &VARA_CONV_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, VARA_CONV_DIR) :PSET &@OS# = GET_VAR(UC_HOST_JCL_VAR, &AGENT#)
:SWITCH &@OS# : CASE UNIX : PSET &SLASH# = '/' : CASE WINDOWS : PSET &SLASH# = '\' :ENDSWITCH
! :PSET &WF_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&TRACK#\&LOGN#\&WF_LOC# ! :PSET &JOBS_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&TRACK#\&LOGN#\&JOB_LOC# :SET &QUEUE# = CLIENT_QUEUE :SET &ALIAS# = '' ! :INC JOBI.ACTIVATE_OBJECT &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = SCRI.CREATE.DIRECTORY
:SET &ALIAS# = JOBS.START.IMPORT.&TALEND# :SET &QUEUE# = QUEUE.&TALEND# :INC JOBI.ACTIVATE_OBJECT &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = JOBS.START_IMPORT_TALEND_PROCESSING

:PSET &MASTER_RUNID# = &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#
:PSET &WALMART_ROOT# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, WALMART_ROOT) :SET &FILE_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, FILE_DIR) :PSET &TEMP_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, TEMP_DIR) :PSET &QUEUE_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, QUEUE_DIR) :PSET &AGENT# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, AGENT) :PSET &LOGIN# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, LOGIN) :PSET &VARA_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, VARA_DIR) :PSET &VARA_CONV_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, VARA_CONV_DIR) :PSET &@OS# = GET_VAR(UC_HOST_JCL_VAR, &AGENT#)
:SWITCH &@OS# : CASE UNIX : PSET &SLASH# = '/' : CASE WINDOWS : PSET &SLASH# = '\' :ENDSWITCH
:PSET &VARA_HOLDING# = 'VARA.HOLDING.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_HOLDING_JOB# = 'VARA.HOLDING.JOB.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED# = 'VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES# = 'VARA.SCRATCH.FILES.&MASTER_RUNID#' :PSET &VARA_DUPLICATE_JOBS# = 'VARA.DUP_JOBS.&MASTER_RUNID#'
:PSET &LOGN# = SYS_USER_NAME() :PSET &ETL_USER_DIR# = STR_LC(&LOGN#)
! Begin block, parse and split the track to indentify the track name !: PSET &TRACK_HOLD=&TRACK# ! : DEFINE &TRACKPATH_STR#, STRING, 5 ! : FILL &TRACKPATH_STR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TRACK#,"\") ! : PSET &TRACK#=&TRACKPATH_STR#[1] ! END BLOCK
:PSET &TALEND_JOBS# = &TALEND#
! :IF &TRACK# <> ''
: SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &SLASH#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &TALEND#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &SLASH#) : PSET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &TRACK#) : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &SLASH#) : PSET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &ETL_USER_DIR#)
! :ELSE ! : PSET &WF_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&WF_LOC# ! : PSET &JOBS_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&JOB_LOC# ! : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &SLASH#) ! : SET &FILE_DIR# = STR_CAT(&FILE_DIR#, &TALEND#) ! :ENDIF ! :PSET &FILE_DIR# = STR_LC(&FILE_DIR#) :PSET &QUEUE# = 'QUEUE.&TALEND#' :SET &ALIAS# = '' ! :INC JOBI.ACTIVATE_OBJECT &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = SCRI.CREATE.DIRECTORY
: PSET &TALEND# =STR_UC(&TALEND#) : PSET &TRACK# = STR_UC(&TRACK#) : PSET &WF_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&TRACK#\&LOGN#\&WF_LOC# : PSET &JOBS_DIR# = &WALMART_ROOT#\&TALEND#\&TRACK#\&LOGN#\&JOB_LOC#
:PSET &VARA_LOC# = &VARA_CONV_DIR#
:INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_SCRATCH_FILES# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_HOLDING# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_HOLDING_JOB# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_HOLDING_PROCESSED# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA_DUPLICATE_JOBS#
:PSET &FILE_PATH# = &FILE_DIR#&SLASH# :SET &SLEEP_VAR# = '' :PSET &CLEAN_UP# = CLEANUP_&MASTER_RUNID# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CLEAN_UP#
:PSET &SECOND_LOOP# = 'FALSE'
:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 100
:P ****** STARTING PROCESS ************ :SET &J# = 'j*.item' :SET &M# = 'm*.item' :SET &LOOP_CNT# = 0
! This will check to see if the jobs already exist in Automic. :SET &FILE_TO_READ# = &FILE_PATH#&J# :INC JOBI.GET_ITEM_FILES :SET &CANT_IMPORT# = 'FALSE' :INC JOBI.CHECK_JOB_EXIST_IN_AUTOMIC
:IF &CANT_IMPORT# = 'TRUE' : SET &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = CALL.JOB_DUPLICATE_LIST : SET &QUEUE# = 'QUEUE.&TALEND#' : SET &RUN_ID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE#, , , , , PASS_VALUES, &QUEUE#, 'CHECK_FOR_DUPLICATE_FOR_&TALEND#')
:ELSE
! This will read the directory and select all the files that have an .item extension. : SET &TIME# = &$PHYS_TIME_HHMMSS# : INC JOBI.SET_TIME_DELAY &MIN# = '01' : print **** The time of &&DT# = &Dt# : SET &QUEUE# = QUEUE.&TALEND#
: SET &FILE_TO_READ# = &FILE_PATH#&J# : WHILE &LOOP_CNT# < 2
: INC JOBI.GET_ITEM_FILES
: SET &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = SCRI.PROCESS_XML : INC JOBI.PROCESS_JOBS &PROCESS_JOBS# = &VARA_HOLDING_JOB#
: SET &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = SCRI.PROCESS_XML : INC JOBI.PROCESS_JOBS &PROCESS_JOBS# = &VARA_HOLDING#
: SET &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = SCRI.PROCESS_XML : INC JOBI.PROCESS_JOBS &PROCESS_JOBS# = &VARA_HOLDING#
: P *** WAITING TO CLEAR VARA.HOLDING **** : INC JOBI.SLEEP &SLEEP_VAR# = &VARA_HOLDING#
: SET &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = JOBP.RUN_IMPORT : INC JOBI.PROCESS_JOBS &PROCESS_JOBS# = &VARA_HOLDING_JOB#
: P *** WAITING TO CLEAR VARA.HOLDING JOBS **** ! : INC JOBI.SLEEP &SLEEP_VAR# = &VARA_HOLDING_JOB#
: SET &LOOP_CNT# = &LOOP_CNT# + 1
: P ****** PROCESSING MASTER JOBS ************ : INC JOBI.SET_TIME_DELAY &MIN# = '03' : print **** The time of &&DT# = &Dt# : SET &FILE_TO_READ# = &FILE_DIR#&SLASH#&M# : ENDWHILE
: SET &OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE# = JOBS.CLEAN_UP : SET &QUEUE# = 'QUEUE.&TALEND#' ! : SET &RUN_ID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&OBJECT_TO_ACTIVATE#, , , , , PASS_VALUES, &QUEUE#, 'CLEAN_UP_&TALEND#')
:ENDIF @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

XHEADER.Title: This will prompt for what client you wish to load

SCRIPT.MSCRI: :SET &AE# = '/app/automic/current' cd &AE#/utility/bin source /app/automic/current/profile ./ucybdbld -B -C&client# -X&AE#/utility/db/transport_file.txt -EREPLACE

XHEADER.Title: This will prompt for what client you wish to unload

:set &loop# = 1 :while &loop# = 1 sleep 30 :endwhile

cd /app/gec/edw/log/import/log/
cat DOCU.0001192153_docs_0001206704.xml ! ls ! cat mj_ofm_us_sales_po_shpmnt_0.1.item ! cat jb_ld_ofm_us_sales_po_shpmnt_0.1.item ! cd / ! app/gec/edw/log/import/log ! cat EVNT.0001202610_MJ.ORDER.CORE.001_0001195440.xml ! cat jb_update_component_status_0.1.item ! cat mj_order_core_ods_0.1.item ! cd /app/gec/edw/log/import/ukasda ! ls ! cat jb_exp_order_asda_tlog_export_multifile_0.1.item
! echo -e "\xC3\xBE\x02"

!cat jb_exp_order_asda_tlog_export_multifile_0.1.item !jb_ld_order_asda_tlog_param_file_upd_0.1.item !jb_ld_order_asda_tlog_param_file_update_0.1.item !jb_ld_tlog_param_file_upd_0.1.item

HEADER.Title: BFD Role account for CSD Summary

SCRIPT.MSCRI: !Write XML to disk :SET &EXPORT_FILE# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, EXPORT_FILE) :SET &EXPORT_FILE# = RESOLVE_VAR(&EXPORT_FILE#) : P XML file &EXPORT_FILE# :SET &RET# = WRITE_PROCESS(&XML#, &EXPORT_FILE#, &AGENT#, &LOGIN#, OVERWRITE) !Import the XML file :SET &RET# = IMPORT(&EXPORT_FILE#, &IMPORT_DIR#, 1, 1)

:SET &DIR# = '&TEMP_DIR#&SLASH#&JOB_INC#.xml' :set &ret# = export(&JOB_INC#,&DIR#) :SET &HND_INC# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#,&DIR#,"*&*") :PROCESS &HND_INC# : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND_INC#,1) : p The line &vk# : SET &POS_AMP# = STR_FIND(&VK#,"&") : SET &POS_AMP# = &POS_AMP# + 1 : SET &POS_LBS# = STR_FIND(&VK#,"#") : SET &POS_DIFF# = &POS_LBS# - &POS_AMP# + 1 : SET &PARAM_KEY# = SUBSTR(&VK#,&POS_AMP#,&POS_DIFF#) : SET &PARAM_KEY# = STR_CAT('&&',&PARAM_KEY#) : P The key is &VK# : IF GET_VAR(&CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#,1) = '' : PUT_VAR &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#, '' : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND_INC#

:PSET &CON# = 'CONVERSION.&PID#' :PSET &CON_WF# = 'CONVERSION_WF.&PID#' :PSET &CON_WF_CR# = 'CONVERSION_WF_CR.&PID#' :PSET &CON_PARAM# = 'CONVERSION_PARAM.&PID#'
:SET &VARA_LOC# = &VARA_CONV_DIR# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_WF# :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_WF_CR# ! :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_PARAM#
! :set &runid# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA", &CON#, "\WALMART\CONVERSION\VARA", "Conversion files", "I", "C", "FREE") ! :set &runid# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA", &CON_WF#, "\WALMART\CONVERSION\VARA", "Conversion Workflows", "I", "C", "FREE") ! :set &runid# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA", &CON_WF_CR#, "\WALMART\CONVERSION\VARA", "Conversion Workflows", "I", "C", "FREE") ! :set &runid# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA", &CON_PARAM#,"\WALMART\CONVERSION\VARA", "Conversion Workflows", "I", "C", "FREE")

:SET &NAME# = &VARA_NAME# :SWITCH &NAME# : CASE 'SCRATCH_FILES' : P --- : CASE 'VARA.HOLDING_JOBS' : P --- : CASE 'VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED' : P --- : CASE 'VARA.HOLDING' : P --- : OTHER : PUT_VAR SCRATCH_FILES, &NAME#, '' :ENDSWITCH
:set &runid# = CREATE_OBJECT(VARA, &VARA_NAME#, &VARA_LOC#, , "I", "C", "FREE")

! :SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&CON#) ! :SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&CON_WF#) ! :SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&CON_WF_CR#) ! :SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&CON_PARAM#) ! :SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT('VARA.&FILE_NAME_KEY#') ! :DELETE_VAR VARA.HOLDING_JOBS, &FILE_NAME_KEY#
! :SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_DELETE#) ! :PROCESS &HND# ! : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) ! : SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&VK#) ! :ENDPROCESS
! :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# ! : SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&VARA_DELETE#)

:SET &isACTIVE# = 'true' :SET &WF_CNT# = 1 :SET &WF_CNT# = FORMAT(&WF_CNT#, "00")
:WHILE &CONNECTION# <> ""
: SET &SOURCE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&CONNECTION#, "@source") : SET &TARGET# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&CONNECTION#, "@target") : SET &CONN_NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&CONNECTION#, "@connectorName") : P SOURCE:&SOURCE# AND TARGET:&TARGET# AND CONNECTION:&CONN_NAME#
: IF &CONN_NAME# = 'COMPONENT_ERROR' : SET &SOURCE# = '' : ENDIF
: if &SOURCE# <> "" : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&CONNECTION#) : WHILE &SUB_SUBELEMENT# <> "" : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#, "@name") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#) : PRINT "attribute value: &SOURCE# &TARGET# &NAME# &VALUE#" : IF &NAME# = 'ACTIVATE' : SET &isACTIVE# = &VALUE# : p isACTIVE is &isACTIVE# : ENDIF : ENDWHILE : ELSE : SET &isACTIVE# = 'false' : ENDIF : IF &isACTIVE# = 'true' : SET &SOURCE# = STR_UC(&SOURCE#) : SET &TARGET# = STR_UC(&TARGET#) : P &WF_CNT#, &SOURCE#, &TARGET# : PUT_VAR &CON_WF#, &WF_CNT#, &SOURCE#, &TARGET# : SET &WF_CNT# = &WF_CNT# + 1 : SET &WF_CNT# = FORMAT(&WF_CNT#, "00") : ENDIF
: SET &isACTIVE# = 'true' : SET &CONNECTION# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&CONNECTION#)
:ENDWHILE :SET &SOURCE# = ""

:WHILE &SUBELEMENT# <> "" : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@name") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : PRINT "attribute value: &NAME# &value#" : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUBELEMENT#)
: SWITCH &NAME# : CASE FILENAME : SET &FILENAME# = &VALUE# : CASE UNIQUE_NAME : SET &JOBNAME# = &VALUE# : ENDSWITCH :ENDWHILE
:PUT &CON#, &JOBNAME#,&FILENAME#,,,,&JOB_CNT# :INCLUDE JOBI.INCR.COUNTER :SET &JOB_CNT# = &CNT#
:P &&FILENAME# = &FILENAME# &&JOBNAME# = &JOBNAME#

:WHILE &SUBELEMENT# <> "" : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@name") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : PRINT "attribute value: &NAME# &value#" : SWITCH &NAME# : CASE ACTIVATE : SET &isACTIVE# = &VALUE# : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = "" : CASE PROCESS : SET &PROCESS# = STR_UC(&VALUE#) : CASE UNIQUE_NAME : SET &JOBNAME# = &VALUE# ! : IF &TYPE_OF_JOB# = 'tParallelize' ! ! : p **** &JOBNAME#,&NAME# , , , ,&JOB_CNT# ! : PUT_VAR &CON#, &JOBNAME#, TPARALLELIZE, , , , &JOB_CNT# ! : ELSE ! : PUT_VAR &CON#, &JOBNAME#, &JOB_PROCESS#, &PROCESS# , , &JOB_CNT# ! : ENDIF ! : SET &isACTIVE# = 'FALSE' ! : ENDIF : CASE 'LABEL' : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = &VALUE# : IF &JOB_PROCESS# = '__PROCESS__' : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = &PROCESS# : ENDIF : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = STR_SUB(&JOB_PROCESS#, '_', '.') : CASE CONTEXTPARAMS : if &isACTIVE# = 'TRUE' : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&SUBELEMENT#) : INCLUDE JOBI.GET_JOB_PARAM_DATA : endif : ENDSWITCH : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUBELEMENT#)
:ENDWHILE ! :SET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(SCRI.CHECK.FOR.MISSING.PARAMETERS,,,,,PASS_VALUES) :P ************** You have processed a jobrun :IF &isACTIVE# = 'TRUE' : SET &JOBNAME# = STR_UC(&JOBNAME#) : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = STR_UC(&JOB_PROCESS#)
: SET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = STR_UC(&FILE_NAME_KEY#) : PRINT ****&JOBNAME# : IF &TYPE_OF_JOB# = 'tParallelize' or 'tInfiniteLoop' or 'tSystem' or 'tFileTouch' : PUT_VAR &CON#, &JOBNAME#, &TYPE_OF_JOB#, , , , &JOB_CNT# : ELSE : IF &JOB_INC# <> "" : SET &PROCESS# = STR_CAT(":INC ", &JOB_INC#) : SET &PROCESS# = STR_UC(&PROCESS#) ! : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = STR_CAT(&FILE_NAME_KEY#, "_") ! : SET &JOB_PROCESS# = STR_CAT(&JOB_PROCESS#, &JOBNAME#) : PUT_VAR &CON#, &JOBNAME#, &JOB_PROCESS#, &PROCESS#, , , &JOB_CNT# : ELSE : PUT_VAR &CON#, &JOBNAME#, &PROCESS#, &PROCESS#, , , &JOB_CNT# : ENDIF : ENDIF ! : SET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(SCRI.CHECK.FOR.MISSING.PARAMETERS,,,,,PASS_VALUES)
: INCLUDE JOBI.INCR.COUNTER : SET &JOB_CNT# = &CNT# :ENDIF
:P &&PROCESS# = &PROCESS# &&JOBNAME# = &JOBNAME#

:SET &COL# = 1 :WHILE &SUB_SUBELEMENT# <> "" : PSET &JOB_INC# = GET_VAR(VARA.COMMON.FUNCTION,&PROCESS#) : PSET &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME# = '&CON_PARAM#_&JOBNAME#' : INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#
: SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#, "@elementRef") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : PRINT "attribute value: &NAME# &value# &job_cnt#" : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUB_SUBELEMENT#) ! : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@name") ! : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@value") : SWITCH &NAME# : CASE "PARAM_NAME_COLUMN" : PSET &PARAM_DATA# = 'TRUE' : P THE PARAM VALUE IS &VALUE# AND &PROCESS# : SET &PARAM# = STR_CAT('&&',&VALUE#) : SET &PARAM# = STR_CAT(&PARAM#,'#')
: CASE "PARAM_VALUE_COLUMN"
: SET &VALUE# = STR_SUB(&VALUE#,'"','') : PUT_VAR &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#, &PARAM#, &VALUE# : SET &VARA# = STR_UC(&PROCESS#) : P &VARA# AND WITH KEY &PARAM# ! : SET &PARAM_COL# = GET_VAR(&PROCESS#,&PARAM#) ! : P THE PARAM_COL IS &PARAM_COL# : P &JOB_CNT#, &VALUE# ! : PUT_VAR '&CON_PARAM#_&NAME#',&PARAM#, &VALUE# : SET &COL# = &COL# + 1
: ENDSWITCH :ENDWHILE
:IF &PARAM_DATA# = 'TRUE' : INC JOBI.CHECK_FOR_MISSING_PARAMETERS :ELSE : INC JOBI.REMOVE_OBJECT &VARA# = &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME# :ENDIF ! :P &&PARAM_NAME# = &PARAM_NAME# &&PARAM_VALUE# = &PARAM_VALUE#
:SET &CNT# = &CNT# + 1 :SET &CNT# = FORMAT(&CNT#,"00")

:IF &act_runid# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#, &ERRINS#) : PUT_VAR_COL VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 3, &MESSAGE# : SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&VARA#) :ENDIF
:SET &RET# = REMOVE_OBJECT(&VARA#)

: SET &XML# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &CNT# = FORMAT("1", "0") : SET &LNR# = &CNT# : SET &ROW# = &CNT# : SET &LOC# = 1 : SET &LOC# = FORMAT(&LOC#, "0") : SET &COL# = FORMAT("1", "0") : SET &HIGH_CNT# = 1 : SET &HIGH_COL# = 1 ! : SET &PRELNR# = FORMAT("1", "0")

: SET &OBJ_TYPE# = GET_OBJECT_TYPE(&JOB_NAME#) : PRINT OBJECT_NAME:&OBJECT_NAME# JOB NAME:&JOB_NAME# OBJECT_TYPE:&OBJ_TYPE# : SET &COL# = GET_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#, &OBJECT_NAME#, 1) : SET &ROW# = GET_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#, &OBJECT_NAME#, 2) : SET &PRELNR# = GET_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#, &OBJECT_NAME#, 5) : IF &PRELNR# > &HIGH_CNT# : SET &HIGH_CNT# = &PRELNR# : ENDIF : IF &COL# > &HIGH_COL# : SET &HIGH_COL# = &COL# : ENDIF : SET &LOC# = GET_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#, &OBJECT_NAME#, 5) : SET &LNR# = &PRELNR# : PRINT LNR:&LNR# COL:&COL# ROW:&ROW# PRELNR:&PRELNR# : SET &LNR# = FORMAT(&LNR#, '0') : SET &COL# = FORMAT(&COL#, '0') : SET &ROW# = FORMAT(&ROW#, '0') : SET &PRELNR# = FORMAT(&PRELNR#, '0') : SET &LOC# = FORMAT(&LOC#, '0')
: INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.BODY.HEADER"
: SET &ROWS_WF# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_WF#, , &OBJECT_NAME#, 2) : SET &ROWS# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&ROWS_WF#, ROWS) : IF &ROWS# = 0 : SET &CNT# = 1 : SET &PRELNR# = 1 : SET &PRELNR# = FORMAT(&PRELNR#, '0') : SET &CNT# = FORMAT(&CNT#, '0') : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.PRECONDITION" : ELSE : SET &CNT# = 1 : PROCESS &ROWS_WF# : SET &JOB# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&ROWS_WF#,2) : P *** &JOB# : SET &PRELNR# = GET_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#,&JOB#,5) : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.PRECONDITION" : ENDPROCESS : ENDIF : CLOSE_PROCESS &ROWS_WF# : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.BODY.FOOTER" : ENDPROCESS
! Create the Jobp Body - End
: P ***** CREATE THE JOBP TRAILER : set &OBJECT_NAME# = "END" : SET &COL# = &HIGH_COL# + 1 : SET &LNR# = &HIGH_CNT# : SET &ROW# = 1 : SET &LOC# = &LNR# + 1 : SET &COL# = FORMAT(&COL#, "0") : SET &LOC# = FORMAT(&LOC#, "0") : SET &ROW# = FORMAT(&ROW#, "0") : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.BODY.END.HEADER" : SET &CNT# = 1 : SET &PREJOB# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#, , 'END', 4) : PROCESS &PREJOB# : SET &JOB# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&PREJOB#, 1) : SET &PRELNR# = GET_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#,&JOB#,5) : PRINT &&JOB# IS &JOB# : SET &CNT# = FORMAT(&CNT#, "0") : SET &PRELNR# = FORMAT(&PRELNR#, "0") : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.PRECONDITION" : SET &CNT# = &CNT# + 1 : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &PREJOB# : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.BODY.END.FOOTER"
! Add the Job Trailer : INC JOBI.WRITE.XML "<XML_DOCU>" = "DOCU.JOBP.TRAILER"

:SET &CNT_END_ARR# = 1 ! This section will find all the ends :SET &CNT# = 1 :WHILE &CNT# <= &ROWS# : SET &JOB_NAME# = &CON_ARRAY#[&CNT#] : SET &JOB_SUCCESSOR# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_WF#, , &JOB_NAME#, 1) : SET &ROWS_END# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&JOB_SUCCESSOR#, ROWS) : CLOSE_PROCESS &JOB_SUCCESSOR# : P &JOB_NAME# &ROWS_END# : IF &ROWS_END# = 0 : PUT_VAR_COL &CON_WF_CR#, &JOB_NAME#, 4, END : SET &END_ARR#[&CNT_END_ARR#] = &JOB_NAME# : SET &CNT_END_ARR# = &CNT_END_ARR# + 1 : ELSE : PUT_VAR_COL &CON_WF_CR#, &JOB_NAME#, 4, '' : ENDIF : SET &CNT# = &CNT# + 1
:ENDWHILE
:P ***** FILE ALL THE STRING OF JOBS :SET &ROW# = 1 :SET &CNT# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&END_ARR#[], SIZE) :P tHE LEN &LEN# :SET &JOB_NAME# = &END_ARR#[&CNT#] :WHILE &CNT# <= &LEN# : P THE JOB_NAME = &JOB_NAME# : SET &JOB_SUCCESSOR# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_WF#, , &JOB_NAME#, 2) : PROCESS &JOB_SUCCESSOR# : IF GET_PROCESS_INFO(&JOB_SUCCESSOR#, ROWS)= 0 : SET &NEXT_JOB# = 'END' : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &JOB_SUCCESSOR#
: SET &ORD_CNT# = 2 : SET &ORDER_ARR#[1] = &JOB_NAME# : SET &PRE_JOB# = &JOB_NAME# : SET &PRE_JOB_EXIST# = 'TRUE' : WHILE &PRE_JOB_EXIST# = 'TRUE' : SET &JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_WF#, , &PRE_JOB#, 2) : SET &ROWS_WF# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&JOBS#, ROWS) : P &&ROWS_WF# &ROWS_WF# &&PRE_JOB# = &PRE_JOB#
: SET &HOLD_JOB# = &PRE_JOB#
: IF &ROWS_WF# = 0 : SET &CURRENT_JOB# = &PRE_JOB# : SET &PRE_JOB# = '' : ENDIF : PROCESS &JOBS# : SET &CURRENT_JOB# = &PRE_JOB# : SET &PRE_JOB# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#, 2) : SET &ORDER_ARR#[&ORD_CNT#] = &PRE_JOB# : P *** ORDER_ARR &ORDER_ARR#[&ORD_CNT#] : SET &ORD_CNT# = &ORD_CNT# + 1 : P &&PRE_JOB# &PRE_JOB# &CNT# : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &JOBS# : IF &PRE_JOB# = '' : SET &PRE_JOB_EXIST# = 'FALSE' : ENDIF : ENDWHILE
: SET &LEN_ORDER# = LENGTH(&ORDER_ARR#[], SIZE) : SET &CNT_ORDER# = 1 : SET &COL# = 2 : SET &LNR# = 1 : P ****** START WRITTING TO THE FILE NUMBER OF RECORDS &LEN_ORDER# : WHILE &CNT_ORDER# <= &LEN_ORDER# : P &ORDER_ARR#[&LEN_ORDER#] : SET &UPDATE_VARA# = 'TRUE' : SET &REC# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&CON_WF_CR#, &ORDER_ARR#[&LEN_ORDER#]) : PROCESS &REC# : SET &LNRR# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&REC#, 6) : PRINT &&LNRR# &LNRR# : IF &LNRR# <> '' : SET &UPDATE_VARA# = ''FALSE' : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &REC# : p THE VALUE OF &&UPDATE_VARA# &UPDATE_VARA# C &COL# R &ROW# LNR &LNR# LOC &LOC# : IF &UPDATE_VARA# = 'TRUE' : SET &COL# = FORMAT(&COL#, '0') : SET &ROW# = FORMAT(&ROW#, '0') : SET &LNR# = FORMAT(&LNR#, '0') : SET &LOC# = FORMAT(&LOC#, '0') : PUT_VAR_COL &CON_WF_CR#, &ORDER_ARR#[&LEN_ORDER#], 1, &COL# : PUT_VAR_COL &CON_WF_CR#, &ORDER_ARR#[&LEN_ORDER#], 2, &ROW# : PUT_VAR_COL &CON_WF_CR#, &ORDER_ARR#[&LEN_ORDER#], 3, &LNR# : PUT_VAR_COL &CON_WF_CR#, &ORDER_ARR#[&LEN_ORDER#], 5, &LOC# : SET &COL# = &COL# + 1 : SET &LNR# = &LNR# + 1 : SET &LOC# = &LOC# + 1 : ENDIF : SET &LEN_ORDER# = &LEN_ORDER# - 1 : ENDWHILE : CLEAR &ORDER_ARR#[] : SET &CNT# = &CNT# + 1 : SET &ROW# = &ROW# + 1 : SET &COL# = &COL# + 1 : SET &JOB_NAME# = &END_ARR#[&CNT#] :ENDWHILE

: ENDIF :ENDWHILE

:SET &PROCESSED_RECORDS_CNT# = 0 :PSET &WF_DIR# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT, WF_DIR) :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(&AGENT#, "&FILE_DIR#&SLASH#&FILE_NAME#.item") :P ******Starting Process XML :SET &XML# = XML_PROCESS_TO_DOM(&HND#) :P **** CREATING PROCESS TO DOM :SET &XML# = XML_SELECT_NODE(&XML#, "node") :SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&XML#, "@componentName") :P &NAME# :SET &isACTIVE# = 'True' :WHILE &NAME# <> "" : SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_FIRST_CHILD(&XML#)
: SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&XML#, "@componentName") : P nAME &NAME# : IF &NAME# <> "" : SET &NEED_TO_PROCESS# = 'FALSE' : IF &NAME# = 'tRunJob' : SET &NEED_TO_PROCESS# = 'TRUE' : ENDIF : IF &NEED_TO_PROCESS# = 'TRUE' : P ***** THE JOBS NEEDS TO BE PROCESS... ***** : SET &PROCESSED_RECORDS_CNT# = 1 : WHILE &SUBELEMENT# <> "" : SET &NAME# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@name") : SET &VALUE# = XML_GET_ATTRIBUTE(&SUBELEMENT#, "@value")
: SWITCH &NAME# : CASE 'ACTIVATE' : SET &isACTIVE# = &VALUE# : SET &SUB_SUBELEMENT# = "" : CASE 'PROCESS' : SET &PROCESS# = STR_UC(&VALUE#) : p &PROCESS# IS ACTIVE &isACTIVE# : IF &isACTIVE# = 'True' : SET &OBJECT_ID# = GET_OH_IDNR(&PROCESS#) : P THE OBJECT ID IS &OBJECT_ID# : IF &OBJECT_ID#= 0 : SET &FILE# = GET_VAR(VARA.HOLDING_JOBS, &PROCESS#) : PUT_VAR &VARA#, &PROCESS#, &FILE# : IF GET_VAR(VARA.COMMON.FUNCTION, &PROCESS#)<> '' ! : PUT_VAR VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 'YES' : SET &act_runid# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(JOBP.RUN_IMPORT, , , , , PASS_VALUES, , &FILE_NAME_KEY#) ! if an error occurs act_runid will be a 0. : INC JOBI.OUTPUT_ERROR : ELSE : P &PROCESS# AND &FILE# GOING IN THE HOLDING FILE : PUT_VAR VARA.HOLDING, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, &FILE_NAME# : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDSWITCH
: SET &SUBELEMENT# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&SUBELEMENT#) : ENDWHILE : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &isACTIVE# = 'True' : SET &XML# = XML_GET_NEXTSIBLING(&XML#) :ENDWHILE
:IF &PROCESSED_RECORDS_CNT# = 0 : PUT_VAR_COL VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 3, 'NO T_RunJobs TO PROCESS' :ENDIF

:INC JOBI.SET_ENVIRNOMENT_VARIABLES
:SET &VARA_LOC# = &VARA_DIR#
:INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = SCRATCH_FILES :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = VARA.HOLDING_JOBS :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED :INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = VARA.HOLDING
:PSET &SECOND_LOOP# = 'FALSE' :DELETE_VAR VARA.HOLDING_JOBS :DELETE_VAR VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED
:DEFINE &STRINGS#, string, 100
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILENAME(&AGENT#, "&FILE_DIR#&SLASH#*.item", "Y", "N", , , , 'UC_LOGIN=&LOGIN#') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#) : FILL &STRINGS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LINE#, &SLASH#) : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRINGS#[], SIZE) : SET &POS# = STR_LENGTH(&STRINGS#[&LEN#]) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 5 : SET &FILE_NAME# = SUBSTR(&STRINGS#[&LEN#], 1, &POS#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 4 : SET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = SUBSTR(&STRINGS#[&LEN#], 1, &POS#) : PUT_VAR VARA.HOLDING_JOBS, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, &FILE_NAME# :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:SET &isACTIVE# = 'True' :SET &JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.HOLDING_JOBS) :P STARTING PROCESS ************ :PROCESS &JOBS# : PSET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#, 1) : PSET &FILE_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&JOBS#, 2) : PUT_VAR VARA.HOLDING.PROCESSED, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 'NO'
: PSET &VARA# = VARA.&FILE_NAME_KEY# : IF &FILE_NAME# <> '' : P ***** CREATING OBJECT &VARA# : SET &VARA_LOC# = &VARA_CONV_DIR# : INC JOBI.CREATE_VARA_TEMPLATE &VARA_NAME# = &VARA# : SET &act_runid# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(SCRI.PROCESS.XML, , , , , PASS_VALUES, , &FILE_NAME_KEY#) ! if an error occurs act_runid will be a 0. : INC JOBI.OUTPUT_ERROR : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &JOBS#
:PSET &SECOND_LOOP# = 'TRUE' :SET &WFLOOP_JOBS# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(VARA.HOLDING_JOBS) :SET &ROWS# = GET_PROCESS_INFO(&WFLOOP_JOBS#, ROWS) :P STARTING PROCESS FOR THE SECOND TIME************ ROWS = &ROWS# :PROCESS &WFLOOP_JOBS# : PSET &FILE_NAME_KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&WFLOOP_JOBS#, 1) : PSET &FILE_NAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&WFLOOP_JOBS#, 2) : SET &OBJECT_ID# = GET_OH_IDNR(&FILE_NAME#) : IF &OBJECT_ID# = 0 : PSET &VARA# = VARA.&FILE_NAME_KEY# : P *** PROCESS FILE &FILE_NAME_KEY#
: SET &act_runid# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(JOBP.RUN_IMPORT, , , , , PASS_VALUES, , &FILE_NAME_KEY#) ! if an error occurs act_runid will be a 0. : INC JOBI.OUTPUT_ERROR : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &WFLOOP_JOBS#
:SET &RUNID# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(JOBS.CLEAN_UP)
:PUT_VAR_COL VARA.HOLDING_JOBS, &FILE_NAME_KEY#, 4, 'BAD XML FILE'
:PSET &PID# = &$ACTIVATOR_RUNID# :DEFINE &WF_CNT#, unsigned :DEFINE &JOB_CNT#, unsigned :DEFINE &CNT#, unsigned :INCLUDE JOBI.CREATE_VARA

:PSET &bin# = GET_VAR(VARA.ENVIRONMENT,bin)
:set &ret# = export(&JOB_INC#,'c:\temp\&JOB_INC#.xml') :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_FILE(WIN01,'c:\temp\&JOB_INC#.xml',"*&*") :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : p The line &vk# : SET &POS_AMP# = STR_FIND(&VK#,"&") : SET &POS_AMP# = &POS_AMP# + 1 : SET &POS_LBS# = STR_FIND(&VK#,"#") : SET &POS_DIFF# = &POS_LBS# - &POS_AMP# + 1 : SET &PARAM_KEY# = SUBSTR(&VK#,&POS_AMP#,&POS_DIFF#) : SET &PARAM_KEY# = STR_CAT('&&',&PARAM_KEY#) : P The key is &VK# : IF GET_VAR(&CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#,1) = '' : PUT_VAR &CON_PARAM_JOBNAME#,&PARAM_KEY#, '' : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
